sentences.sContent: In this way, they were hoping to achieve the next evolutionary rung of the ladder: A perfect human race.
sentences.sCn: 以这种方式，他们希望能达到下一个进化的地位：完美的人类，完美的种族。

sentences.sContent: This trend towards dealing with extraterrestrials as near equals, he believes, is encouraging progress for the human race, since it means we are coming out of our planetary cocoon.
sentences.sCn: 把外星人当作平等物来处理的这种趋势，他认为，正鼓励着人类种族的进步，因为它意味着我们正走出我们的行星茧。

trans.tranOther: all people, considered together as a group
